Package ulb.infof307.g9.view.store

Class DownloadDeckView

java.lang.Object
ulb.infof307.g9.view.store.DownloadDeckView
All Implemented Interfaces:
javafx.fxml.Initializable, Observable<DownloadDeckView.Listener>
public class DownloadDeckView extends Object implements javafx.fxml.Initializable, Observable<DownloadDeckView.Listener>
The DownloadDeckView class represents a view for downloading decks. It implements the Initializable interface and extends the Observable interface.
